titleStmt.title: A manual or miscellany of meditations, apothegms, sentences, precepts, observations, characters, and essayes Necessary for every ones contemplation. By R. R.
A manual or miscellany of meditations, apothegms, sentences, precepts, observations, characters, and essayes Necessary for every ones contemplation. By R. R.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Nath. Brook, at the Angel in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: Last two pages of text (F10v, F11r) numbered in error: 120-12[1]; F10r numbered 139.
With errata at foot of F11r, and three final pages of advertisments.
Running title: A manual, or miscellany of meditations, apothegms, and essays.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
